description: Written form of a reduction of give me.

definitionGroups.group: (colloquial) That which is easy to perform or obtain, especially in sports.

entries.meaning: (golf) A tap-in putt, usually a couple inches from the cup.
examples: Don't count two strokes for that â€” it was a gimme: if I wasn't holding the flag with my other hand, for the next players waiting on the hole, it would have gone in.

entries.meaning: That which is simply given away for nothing; a freebie.
That which is certain; that which is sure to be the case.
